Posts.Content: maryelsa322 wrote: I have stage 2 breast cancer, but they told me it was a very rare form - metaplastic.  Please, please tell me if anyone has this and did you have chemo?  Does it work?  I'm so upset right now.  I don't know what to do.  I'm going to go for a second opinion.
